thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Did I Really Buy That? It’s Prime Time for Charge-Card Reversals

author: Jo Craven McGinty
title: Did I Really Buy That? It’s Prime Time for Charge-Card Reversals
text:
Retailers score big over the holidays. But in late December and January, when disputes over purchases spike, it’s time for payback.
According to one analysis, U.S. merchants and credit card issuers can expect to see $980 million in disputed charges reversed in consumers’ favor.

The volume of these postholiday chargebacks is 25% to 35% higher...
